title: Point Pointset Metadata
description: Information about a specific point name of the device.

units.description: Expected unit configuration for the point

writeable.description: Indicates if this point is writable (else read-only)

baseline_value.definition: Used for telemetry validation in a lab environment. Represents the expected baseline point value

baseline_tolerance.definition: Used for telemetry validation in a lab environment. Maximum deviation from `baseline_vaue` acceptable to consider a point's present vale as expected

baseline_state.definition: Used for writeable point testing in a lab environment. Expected state when `baseline_value` is set as the `set_value` in the config message

cov_increment.description: Triggering threshold for partial cov update publishing

ref.description: A local network reference for a point, e.g. BACnet address or Modbus register
